message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $145. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, but I value the product at a higher price point. Would you consider meeting in the middle at $137.5?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $132?
